text: num̆balāgē paramādhipatigen pæhædili sādhaka num̆balā veta pæmiṇa æta. ebævin kavareku eya (adhīkṣaṇaya koṭa) balannēda eya ohuṭama (hon̆dak vannē)ya. namut kavareku (ē gæna) andhayaku men kaṭayutu karannē da eya ohuṭama erehivaya. tavada mama num̆balāgē ārakṣakayā novemi (yæyi nabivaraya! pavasanu)
